scripts.setup: cordova platform add android ios electron
scripts.dev-android: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android run-p serve:cordova autobuild cordova-run-android
scripts.bundle-android: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android CORDOVA_PROD=true npm run build
scripts.build-android: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android CORDOVA_PROD=true npm run build-android-subtask
scripts.build-android-subtask: npm run build && cordova build android
scripts.dev-ios: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios run-p serve:cordova autobuild cordova-run-ios
scripts.bundle-ios: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios CORDOVA_PROD=true npm run build
scripts.build-ios: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios CORDOVA_PROD=true npm run build-ios-subtask
scripts.build-ios-subtask: npm run build && cordova build ios
scripts.dev-electron: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=electron run-p serve:cordova autobuild cordova-run-electron
scripts.bundle-electron: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=electron CORDOVA_PROD=true npm run build
scripts.build-electron: cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=electron CORDOVA_PROD=true npm run build-electron-subtask
scripts.build-electron-subtask: npm run build && cordova build electron
